name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-file-type-distribution
title: File Type Distribution
shortDescription: This web part analyzes a SharePoint document library and visualizes the distribution of file types inside it. It uses the SharePoint Search API refiners to aggregate file type counts without enumerating items.
longDescription: This web part analyzes a SharePoint document library and visualizes the distribution of file types inside it. It uses the SharePoint Search API refiners to aggregate file type counts without enumerating items.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
